title: Makeruna! Senta: Sayonara Ijime Mushi
original_name: 負けるな！千太～さよならいじめ虫～
sinopse: Human beings as well as other creatures have a cruel heart. Everyone thinks that all they're doing is bullying insects. In this anime each individual is confronted with the bullying and asked about it; their replies show the ugliness of their own hearts.
